triples.o: sum over k of x of k times h of n minus k
substituting k equals n minus capital K
triples.evidence: By substituting k equals n minus capital K, we change the index of summation and rewrite the expression in reversed order.

triples.o: h convolved with x equals x convolved with h
triples.evidence: This leads directly to: h convolved with x equals x convolved with h.
